modName: Dawnguard Craft Potion of Blood - DELETED
summary: Creates 5 Blood Potions from 1 Human Heart & 1 Human Flesh
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static-8.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/30292-1-1430013922.png[/img][/center][center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65278/?][img]http://i1.minus.com/izEj4oDlRduYw.png[/img][/url][/center]

[size=15][color=red]Dawnguard Craft Potion of Blood[/color][/size]

I was playing my Dawnguard Vampire (my usual choice) and noticed there wasn't a way to craft my own blood potions. There also isn't that many laying around to pick up either.

I am sure there are plenty of other versions of this same type of mod, but I felt that I could improve a bit by making it 5 per 1 heart & 1 flesh.

[size=13]What does this mod do?[/size]
Creates 5 Blood Potions from 1 Human Heart & 1 Human Flesh

The crafting option is at the Cooking Pot, and only shows up when you have at least 1 Human Heart and 1 Human Flesh in your inventory.

[size=11]Recommended Mods[/size]
[list]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11617/?]Humans Drop Human Parts[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16553/?]Harvest Overhaul[/url]Â (Option needs to be enabled in overhaul creatures)
[/list]
author: JennyKitten78

files.name: Craft Dawnguard Blood Potion
files.changelogHtml:
Produces 1 bottle of blood.
Requires 1 Human Flesh and 1 Human Heart.
Can be created at any cooking location.

files.name: Main File - Updated
files.changelogHtml:
Now produces 5 bottles of blood.
Uses same amount of ingredients.
